speaker: MERCUTIO
text: hath a hair more or a hair less in his beard than

speaker: MERCUTIO
text: thou hast. Thou wilt quarrel with a man for cracking

speaker: MERCUTIO

speaker: MERCUTIO

speaker: MERCUTIO

speaker: MERCUTIO
text: beaten as addle as an egg for quarreling. Thou hast

speaker: MERCUTIO

speaker: MERCUTIO

speaker: MERCUTIO

speaker: MERCUTIO

speaker: MERCUTIO
text: another, for tying his new shoes with old ribbon?
